' complex fixture
// comment line
; another comment

participant "Big Boss" as Boss
participant Alice
participant "Bob B" as Bob
participant Carol
participant "QA Team" as QA
participant "データ" as Data

Alice->Bob: solid
note left: inline left
note right: inline right
Bob<-Alice: solid-left
note left of Bob: explicit left
note right of Alice: explicit right
note over Alice,Bob: explicit over
Alice->>Bob: open
Bob<<-Alice: open-left
Alice-->Bob: dashed
Bob<--Alice: dashed-left
Alice->xBob: x
note left
multi
line
end note
Bob x<-Alice: x-left
Bob->Carol: implicit-defined
Bob->Eve: implicit-new
Alice->"QA Team": quoted target
note right of QA: qa note
QA->Boss: "multi
line
message"
Boss->Boss: self
Data->Alice: "데이터 전송"
Alice->Bob: http://example.com/path?x=1&y=2
